creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
text: Later edition of L2019.293.240a-c with new title, published probably in April 1895.
title: Our Forces Occupying in the Fierce Battle of Tianzhuangtai, Long Live the Great Victory of the Imperial Army of Great Japan
